name: On Strike Baseball!
description:
On Strike Baseball!

You are at bat and have to select the right pitches to be able to survive long enough to get your team a homerun... before the game gets cancelled!

Tradition for me is baseball! National sport! 

On any given pitch the game can end so pay attention

to what pitch cards are picked to get through the last inning before game goes on strike! 

Once you last a while you'll be able to make a homerun!

 Swing to the right pitch.

Also wanted this to be minimalistic in gameplay.

Select from only 3 cards and a basic art style.

Using "flickgame" I was able to make the interactions

without any code and convert it to droid! Retro type experience~!

Game takes about a minute to load (on my device). 

Click the grass to start and just click the pitch 

cards to progress... Red arrows restart! Batters up!
